mapper.sql: RESUME_ID, RESUME_JDSJ, RESUME_XXMC, RESUME_JYJLID, RESUME_ZYL, RESUME_ZY, RESUME_XL, RESUME_ZYMS, RESUME_JDSJ1,RESUME_YXPM,RESUME_BJPM, RESUME_ADDTIME,RESUME_DELFLAG
mapper.update:
update RESUME_JYJL
RESUME_JDSJ=#{resumeJdsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_JDSJ1=#{resumeJdsj1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_XXMC=#{resumeXxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_ZYL=#{resumeZyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_ZY=#{resumeZy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_XL=#{resumeXl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_ZYMS=#{resumeZyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_YXPM=#{resumeYxpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_BJPM=#{resumeBjpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESUME_ADDTIME = #{resumeAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESUME_DELFLAG = #{resumeDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where RESUME_JYJLID = #{resumeJyjlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into RESUME_JYJL (RESUME_JYJLID,RESUME_ID,RESUME_JDSJ,RESUME_JDSJ1,RESUME_XXMC, RESUME_ZYL,RESUME_ZY, RESUME_XL, RESUME_ZYMS,RESUME_YXPM,RESUME_BJPM,RESUME_ADDTIME,RESUME_DELFLAG) values (#{resumeJyjlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeJdsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeJdsj1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeXxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeZyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeZy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeXl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeZyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeYxpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeBjpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resumeAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{resumeDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X ON X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL WHERE RESUME_ID =#{resumeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY RESUME_JDSJ
